channel.title: Client errors!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]When you saw this at your screen[/size]
[img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/7941/unledxxnq.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Go to my computer or your C: Drive (Double click your C: Drive) and you will see something like this ![/size]
[img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/4713/unled1qp.png[/img]
[size=18pt]When you found the InsanityX Cache at your C: Drive (Double click the InsanityX cache Folder) and you will see something like this ![/size]
[img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/1037/unled2yh.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]When you saw another InsanityX cache folder (Double click it) and you will see something like this ![/size]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/3310/unled3ie.jpg[/img]
Copy all the folders in it !
[size=18pt]Now when you're done copying , go back to here & delete everything ! [/size]
[img]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/2610/unled4zc.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]After deleting everything in there , Paste the one's that you have copied ! Pm me if you still dont understand well ! Sorry about the inconvenience ![/size] [/center]
[size=14pt]This is what the problems i have ! I wanna know a way to fix it ! so my players wont have to be troubled to delete and paste files please help thanks ![/size]

item.title: Client errors!
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

[center][size=18pt]When you saw this at your screen[/size]

[size=18pt]Go to my computer or your C: Drive (Double click your C: Drive) and you will see something like this ![/size]

[size=18pt]When you found the InsanityX Cache at your C: Drive (Double click the InsanityX cache Folder) and you will see something like this ![/size]

[size=18pt]When you saw another InsanityX cache folder (Double click it) and you will see something like this ![/size]

Copy all the folders in it !

[size=18pt]Now when you’re done copying , go back to here & delete everything ! [/size]

[size=18pt]After deleting everything in there , Paste the one’s that you have copied !
Pm me if you still dont understand well !
Sorry about the inconvenience ![/size] [/center]

[size=14pt]This is what the problems i have !
I wanna know a way to fix it ! so my players wont have to be troubled to delete and paste files
please help thanks ![/size]
